S

screenHeight - Variable in class OrbitingPlanets
keeps the height of the screen so you only need change in 1 place
screenWidth - Variable in class OrbitingPlanets
keeps the width of the screen so you only need change in 1 place
setColor(Color) - Method in class Planet
setter for the color of the planet
setCurrentX(double) - Method in class Planet
setter for the current X value of the planet
setCurrentY(double) - Method in class Planet
setter for the current Y value of the planet
setRadius(double) - Method in class Planet
setter for the radius of the planet
setSunX(double) - Method in class Planet
setter for the sun X value
setSunY(double) - Method in class Planet
setter for the sun Y value
sizeAtStart - Variable in class PlanetMover
the size of the planets array list at construction
sunPointsAtStart - Variable in class PlanetMover
the sun x,y values at construction
sunX - Variable in class OrbitingPlanets
keeps the suns X coordinate for ease of calculation
sunX - Variable in class Planet
stores the X value of the sun of the planet, for a planet it will be the sun, for a moon it will be it's corresponding planet
sunY - Variable in class OrbitingPlanets
keeps the suns Y coordinate for ease of calculation
sunY - Variable in class Planet
stores the X value of the sun of the planet, for a planet it will be the sun, for a moon it will be it's corresponding planet
